ai-anya-e0605n8:2_0: if it is due to a decay;
ai-anya-e0605n8:3_0: Many meritorious talk, like that with her shining beauty (only)
ai-anya-e0605n8:5_0: Siddhattha, Siddhattha, having gained the queen,
ai-anya-e0605n8:6_0: Surrounded by forty-thousand of his men,
ai-anya-e0605n8:10_0: enjoy the happiness of heavenly happiness,
